links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..200
formula: a(n)=binomial(n+9, 9)*A000984(n+9)/A000984(9), where A000984 are the central binomial coefficients. - _Wolfdieter Lang_a(n) = ((2*n+17)*(2*n+15)*(2*n+13)*(2*n+11)*(2*n+9)*(2*n+7)*(2*n+5)*(2*n+3)*(2*n+1)/34459425)*Binomial(2*n, n). - _Vincenzo Librandi_, Jul 05 2013
prog: (MAGMA) [&*[2*n+i: i in [1..17 by 2]]*Binomial(2*n, n)/34459425: n in [0..20]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Jul 05 2013
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
